name: clang-format-alt
description: Use Clang-Format in Visual Studio Code

clang-format.alt.style.description: clang-format style.(-style=value, value can be file, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit or json configure)

clang-format.alt.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style.(-fallback-style=value, value can be none, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit)

clang-format.alt.language.cpp.enable.description: enable formatting for C++ (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.cpp.style.description: clang-format fallback style for C++, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.cpp.fallbackSt.description: clang-format fallback style for C++, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.language.c.enable.description: enable formatting for C (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.c.style.description: clang-format fallback style for C, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.c.fallbackStyl.description: clang-format fallback style for C, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.language.objective-c.en.description: enable formatting for Objective-C (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.objective-c.st.description: clang-format fallback style for Objective-C, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.objective-c.fa.description: clang-format fallback style for Objective-C, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.language.objective-cpp..description: enable formatting for Objective-C++ (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)
clang-format fallback style for Objective-C++, left empty to use clang-format.style
clang-format fallback style for Objective-C++, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.language.java.enable.description: enable formatting for Java (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.java.style.description: clang-format fallback style for Java, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.java.fallbackS.description: clang-format fallback style for Java, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.language.javascript.ena.description: enable formatting for JavaScript (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.javascript.sty.description: clang-format fallback style for JavaScript, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.typescript.ena.description: enable formatting for TypeScript (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.typescript.sty.description: clang-format fallback style for TypeScript, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.proto.enable.description: enable formatting for Protobuf (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.proto.style.description: clang-format fallback style for Protobuf, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.proto.fallback.description: clang-format fallback style for Protobuf, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.language.apex.enable.description: enable formatting for Apex (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.apex.style.description: clang-format fallback style for Apex, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.apex.fallbackS.description: clang-format fallback style for Apex, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.language.glsl.enable.description: enable formatting for GLSL (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.glsl.style.description: clang-format fallback style for GLSL, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.glsl.fallbackS.description: clang-format fallback style for GLSL, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.language.hlsl.enable.description: enable formatting for HLSL (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.hlsl.style.description: clang-format fallback style for HLSL, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.hlsl.fallbackS.description: clang-format fallback style for HLSL, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.language.cuda.enable.description: enable formatting for CUDA (requires reloading Visual Studio Code)

clang-format.alt.language.cuda.style.description: clang-format fallback style for CUDA, left empty to use clang-format.style

clang-format.alt.language.cuda.fallbackS.description: clang-format fallback style for CUDA, left empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.alt.assumeFilename.description: When reading from stdin, clang-format assumes this filename to look for a style config file (with -style=file) and to determine the language.
